update t_network_room set networkroom_name = #{networkroom_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workplace_id = #{workplaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
